story:
Improve rooftop farming in France

France was named host country for the COP 21 and would like to become an example for environment health. Green roofs are popular in the world, and France is a good place to grow organic products. We want to build rooftop farms on French buildings. People can become partners and pay a subscription to access for the roof, where they can walk through the plants to relax or maintain the garden.

Développons la culture sur toit en France

La France à été nommée pays hôte pour la "COP 21" en Décembre 2015 et doit pour cela devenir un exemple en terme de protection de l'environnement. Les toits végétalisés sont populaires dans le monde, et la France est un bon endroit pour cultiver des produits biologiques. Notre but est de convertir les toits des immeubles Français en ferme biologique. Les habitants de ses immeubles pourront alors payer un abonnement qui leur permettra d'accéder aux toits où ils pourront marcher à travers les plantes pour se détendre ou entretenir le jardin.




Why rooftop farming ?

A study from the National Research Council of Canada shows the differences between roofs with gardens and roofs without gardens. The study shows temperature effects on different layers of each roof at different times of the day. Roof gardens are obviously very beneficial in reducing the effects of temperature against roofs without gardens. “ Roofs with gardens help to reduce pollution to and decrease smog episodes.

The research is available from the following link :

http://sustainabletechnologies.ca/wp/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/NRC_OttawaGRrept.pdf

There is also a reduction of the costs for the people who live in the building with heating and air conditioning reduction. And for the cost of the products grown on the rooftop cuting out the middle-man.

Other benefits are healthy organic products delivered by organic agriculture: "Organic agriculture is a holistic production management system which promotes and enhances agro-ecosystem health, including biodiversity, biological cycles, and soil biological activity. It emphasizes the use of management practices in preference to the use of off-farm inputs, taking into account that regional conditions require locally adapted systems. This is accomplished by using, where possible, agronomic, biological, and mechanical methods, as opposed to using synthetic materials, to fulfil any specific function within the system."

(FAO/WHO Codex Alimentarius Commission, 1999).

Pourquoi la culture sur toit ?

Une étude du Conseil National de Recherche du Canada montre la différence entre les toits avec et les toits sans jardins. Cette étude montre les températures des toits à différents moments de la journée. Les toits végétalisés apparaissent très avantageux comparés aux toits classiques en réduisant les effets de la température. Ils aident aussi à combattre la pollution et le problème de "smog".

Retrouvez l'étude en suivant ce lien ( en anglais) :

http://sustainabletechnologies.ca/wp/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/NRC_OttawaGRrept.pdf

Il ne faut pas oublier la réduction des coûts pour les personnes vivant dans les immeubles grâce aux réduction de chauffage et de climatisation. Et bien entendu grâce à la réduction du coût des produits cultivés sur les toits en réduisant les intermédiaires.

Il y a aussi les avantages des produits cultivés en agriculture biologique :

« La production biologique est un système global de gestion agricole et de production alimentaire qui allie les meilleures pratiques environnementales, un haut degré de biodiversité, la préservation des ressources naturelles, l’application de normes élevées en matière de bien-être animal et une méthode de production respectant la préférence de certains consommateurs à l’égard des produits obtenus grâce à des substances et des procédés naturels »

Lien en Français :

http://www.ecohabitation.com/guide/toits-vegetaux-etape-etape-avantages-inconvenients 

Règlement (CE) N°834/2007 du Conseil de l'Union européenne



How install green roofs ?

Green roofs are places at the top of the buildings where we could put organic product it's very easy and we can put them anywhere, there is lot of advantages because of the qualities of the nature.

Many roofs can be modified to install green roofs we just need a permission from the city and from people who live/work inside.
Moreover there is lot of exemple of project which show us how we can process to install this kind of roof so we just need you support.
lien : http://www.greenroofs.org/index.php/about/aboutgreenroofs

Comment installer des toits végétalisés ?

Les toits verts sont des endroits en haut des buildings ou même des maison ou nous pouvons placer des produits organic, cela est très facile et peut se faire partout, il y a beaucoup d'avantage liés aux qualités naturels du sol.
Beaucoup de toits peuvent être modifier pour installer des toits vert, nous avons juste besoin de l'accord de la ville et des gens qui vivent/travaillent à l'intérieur.
De plus il y a beaucoup d'exemples de projet qui nous montre comment l'on peut procéder pour installer ce type de toits et nous avons donc juste besoin de votre soutien. 
Lien : http://www.ecohabitation.com/guide/toits-vegetaux-etape-etape-avantages-inconvenients



How can i benefit from the rooftop ?

You can became a member and then access to your weakly organic basket and access the garden when you want to relax.

Comment accéder aux toits ?

Vous pouvez devenir membre dés aujourd'hui et accéder à votre panier bio hebdomadaire. Vous pourrez accéder aux toits quand vous en aurez l'envie pour vous détendre. 



Who are we ?

Two students in sales management passionate by the ecologic development to protect the earth. There are a lot of advantages  in France to be a student and entrepreneur, first there is a lot of helps delivered by the state and we can our  teachers to give their advice.

Qui sommes nous ?

Nous sommes deux étudiants en école de commerce, passionnés par le developpement ecologique et la protection de l'environnement. Il y a de nombreux avantages pour nous d'être à la fois étudiant et de créer notre entreprise, d'abord nous avons droit à certaines aides de l'état et nos professeurs sont eux aussi là pour nous aider.

Why crowdfunding ?

We need money to launch this business and create the first garden. We need to find the good place and to advertise to get people interested.

We also need to buy all the equipment to install organic product and to grow them with the perfect conditions. 

You can help us !


Pourquoi le financement participatif ?

Nous avons besoin d'argent pour lancer cette affaire et construire le premier jardin. Nous devons trouver le bon endroit et communiquer pour capter l'attention du public.
Nous avons également besoin d'acheter tout le matérielle pour installer les produits organic et les faire pousser avec les meilleurs conditions possible.
Vous pouvez nous aider !

Compensations

The compensations will be available on the future website , you can access to the products which we will cultivate but also to other French organic roof products.You can also buy some garden equipments and even guides to be able to  launch your own organic production.
These products can  be send to you by coli everywhere !

Furthermore T-SHIRT can be send to you just after the campaign.

Contreparties 

Les contreparties seront disponibles sur le site internet a venir, vous pourrez ainsi avoir accés aux produits que l'on aura cultiver mais aussi a des produits dérivés ainsi qu'a du matériel de culture et même des guides afin de pouvoir vous lancez dans le développement durable.
Ces produits pourront ainsi vous être envoyer par coli ou que vous soyez !
De plus les T-SHIRT peuvent vous être envoyer juste après la campagne.

Are there any risks ?

They are risks in any project and this one is not an exception, but you can see the advantages of green gardens and other similar projects on the web :

http://www.organicroofs.co.uk/installation/detailing/

http://www.optigreen.fr/

http://www.greenroofs.org/

Y a t-il des risques ?

Tout projet comporte des risques, et celui-ci n'est pas une exeption, mais vous pouvez deja voir les avantages des toitures vegetalisés et d'autres projets similaires sur intenet :

http://www.organicroofs.co.uk/installation/detailing/

http://www.optigreen.fr/

http://www.greenroofs.org/




IF YOU HAVE ANY QUESTION JUST ASK !

E-mail me : frenchorganicroof@gmail.com

En cas de question n'hésitez pas !

Envoyez moi un E-mail : frenchorganicroof@gmail.com




Have a great day !

Passez une bonne journée !
story_txt:
Improve rooftop farming in France
France was named host country for the COP 21 and would like to become an example for environment health. Green roofs are popular in the
world, and France is a good place to grow organic products. We want to
build rooftop farms on French buildings. People can become partners and pay
a subscription to access for the roof, where they can walk through the
plants to relax or maintain the garden.
Développons la culture sur toit en FranceLa France à été nommée pays hôte pour la "COP 21" en Décembre 2015 et doit pour cela devenir un exemple en terme de protection de l'environnement. Les toits végétalisés sont populaires dans le monde, et la France est un bon endroit pour cultiver des produits biologiques. Notre but est de convertir les toits des immeubles Français en ferme biologique. Les habitants de ses immeubles pourront alors payer un abonnement qui leur permettra d'accéder aux toits où ils pourront marcher à travers les plantes pour se détendre ou entretenir le jardin.




Why rooftop farming ?
A study from the National Research Council of Canada
shows the differences between roofs with gardens and roofs without gardens. The study shows temperature effects on different layers of
each roof at different times of the day. Roof gardens are obviously very
beneficial in reducing the effects of temperature against roofs without
gardens. “ Roofs with gardens help to reduce pollution to and decrease smog episodes.The research is available from the following link :
http://sustainabletechnologies.ca/wp/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/NRC_OttawaGRrept.pdf
There is also a reduction of the costs for the people who live in the building with heating and air conditioning reduction. And for
the cost of the products grown on the rooftop cuting out the middle-man.
Other benefits are healthy organic products delivered
by organic agriculture: "Organic agriculture is a holistic production
management system which promotes and enhances agro-ecosystem health, including
biodiversity, biological cycles, and soil biological activity. It emphasizes
the use of management practices in preference to the use of off-farm inputs,
taking into account that regional conditions require locally adapted systems.
This is accomplished by using, where possible, agronomic, biological, and
mechanical methods, as opposed to using synthetic materials, to fulfil any
specific function within the system."
(FAO/WHO Codex Alimentarius
Commission, 1999).
Pourquoi la culture sur toit ?Une étude du Conseil National de Recherche du Canada montre la différence entre les toits avec et les toits sans jardins. Cette étude montre les températures des toits à différents moments de la journée. Les toits végétalisés apparaissent très avantageux comparés aux toits classiques en réduisant les effets de la température. Ils aident aussi à combattre la pollution et le problème de "smog".Retrouvez l'étude en suivant ce lien ( en anglais) :http://sustainabletechnologies.ca/wp/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/NRC_OttawaGRrept.pdfIl ne faut pas oublier la réduction des coûts pour les personnes vivant dans les immeubles grâce aux réduction de chauffage et de climatisation. Et bien entendu grâce à la réduction du coût des produits cultivés sur les toits en réduisant les intermédiaires.Il y a aussi les avantages des produits cultivés en agriculture biologique :« La production
biologique est un système global de gestion agricole et de production
alimentaire qui allie les meilleures pratiques environnementales, un haut degré
de biodiversité, la préservation des ressources naturelles, l’application de
normes élevées en matière de bien-être animal et une méthode de production
respectant la préférence de certains consommateurs à l’égard des produits
obtenus grâce à des substances et des procédés naturels »Lien en Français :http://www.ecohabitation.com/guide/toits-vegetaux-etape-etape-avantages-inconvenients 
Règlement (CE) N°834/2007
du Conseil de l'Union européenne

Green roofs are places at the top of the buildings where we could put organic product it's very easy and we can put them anywhere, there is lot of advantages because of the qualities of the nature.
Many roofs can be modified to install green roofs we just need a permission from the city and from people who live/work inside.
Moreover there is lot of exemple of project which show us how we can process to install this kind of roof so we just need you support.

story:
Our Team

We are a young, small company from Bucharest Romania, specialized in producing natural organic fertilizers such as manure and compost as well as in gardening and landscaping. Our team consists of young, ambitious, talented, environmentalists colleagues. (www.biofertil.ro)

The ideea of planting trees came to us, after reading a complaint formulated by Greenpeace Romania about illegal deforestation. Many demonstrations took place in our country in the past years regarding this terrible issue. (http://www.greenpeace.org/romania/ro/campanii/paduri/Activitati/1000000-de-arbori-taiati-anual-fara-impact-de-mediu/?gclid=COHv-Kis7sYCFcnItAodkQ8ESQ). 


The SAD Reality


In the last 20 years old, natural grown forests were literally massacred all over the Romanian territory. Forests occupy only 27 % of the country, with 6 % below the European average, and timber harvesting in Romania is in a much faster rate than the rest of Europe.

Romania had 6.515 million hectares of forest, occupying 27.4% of the country where 51 % of the forest belongs to the state, the remaining being private property. During the period 1990-2011 there were 366,000 hectares of forest cleared, both from state forestry departments or private ones, as stated by a report made by the Romanian Court of Auditors, but according to a same study conducted by Greenpeace Romania the situation is much worse meaning that over 3 hectares of forest are being cleared every single hour!


The "TREE Revolution"campaign

Our main Goal for this campaign is to successfully plant 6850 Red Oaks (Quercus rubra) on a total surface of 100.000 sqm (10 Hectars). On each hectar we will plant 685 saplings each of them having enough space for optimal development (16 sqm).
If we manage this, we can then go to a next level, setting our goals even higher.
Calculations have been made in order to define the total funds needed:

  • for each 10 USD you donate a new Red Oak Tree is born. Beside this amount, all other costs (until the sapling is safely planted into the ground) will be provided by us (transportation, necessary planting tools, fertilizer, watering, etc.)
  • furthermore we have created simple but unique Perks that will make you remember this campaign and the fact that YOU helped NATURE!
  • if the total funds are not raised, we will plant as much as possible, meaning that for each 6.850 USD collected, a hectar (10.000 sqm) of a young Red Oak forest will be borned,


Importance of trees - General facts

1. trees help regulate the Earth's climate because they store nearly 300 billion tons of carbon - 40 times more than the annual emissions of greenhouse gases from burning fossil fuels. When forests are destroyed, the stored carbon is released into the atmosphere as greenhouse gas emissions that contribute to climate change - the carbon dioxide;

2. trees live longer than all organisms on Earth;

3. trees get about 90% of their food from the atmosphere and only 10% from the soil;

4. trees cover nearly 30% of the earth's surface;

5. securing land by planting trees is the best way to fight soil erosion and landslides.


Why Red Oak?

The Red Oak tree (Quercus rubra) is a species originating from North America and was introduced in Romania in the 1900's throughout the country, using both decorative purposes as well as forest trees. Beeing resistant and having a large climate amplitude, meaning that it has a high adaptive potential to climate changes, we have chosen it for our "TREE Revolution"campaign. It's beauty, especially in autum when all of its leaves turn red was also one of the considerations for our choice.

Red Oaks are not only simple trees but also a food source for both domestic and wild animals, due to its fruits, the well known acorns. Humans have also found throughout time, different uses for acorns, ranging from medical purposes to recreational, spiritual ones.

Start the TREE Revolution!

Knowing the importance of a healthy environment, not only for us today but also for the next generations to come, we are confident that this campaign and the ones to follow, will be a real success.

Other ways you can help!


Donate as little as 1 dollar or spread the word and LET US START THE TREE REVOLUTION!

story:
The problem

Over 300 million Americans get their tap water from public water systems in the United States and in just one year the average American uses over 100,000 gallons (indoors and outside). 

http://water.epa.gov/learn/kids/drinkingwater/w...

The EPA only regulates “114 of those pollutants, setting maximum legal levels that water utilities achieved 92 percent of the time, according to the study.” 

http://www.scientificamerican.com/article/tap-d...

A three-year study by the Environmental Working Group analysis of 20 million tap water quality tests found “a total of 316 contaminants -- including industrial solvents, weed killers, refrigerants and the rocket fuel component perchlorate -- in water supplied to the public between 2004 and 2009”

We need your help to raise money in order to  make our innovative technology accessible to people and bring awareness of our technology to parties that can further assist us, and this process is quite costly. To start with, we plan publishing relevant articles in the following reputable magazines: DR. OZ, Health, Women’s Health, Home & Garden, Country Living, Cottages, etc. It is for this reason that we chose a $50,000 goal in regards to our campaign.

Our technologically superior residential water purification system Pure Defense has been proven to eliminate threats posed by both Bacteria and Chemical contaminants. We believe that if we obtain the necessary investment, we can make our water purification systems more accessible to a wider array of people and allow everyone an access to drinking water without any harmful chemicals and bacteria!

What is OUR goal?

Our goal is simple and achievable. We would like to  finalize the development of our innovative technology which has been proven to eliminate threats posed by both Bacteria and Chemical contaminants found in drinking water and make our technology accessible to people, as it tackles fundamental issues directly affecting people's health. 

We would also like to bring awareness into the issue that the vast majority of our municipal drinking water is being consumed alongside harmful chemicals and randomly occurring bacteria contamination that have consistently been linked to cancers and other diseases all while a proven solution of removing said chemicals and bacteria exists thanks to our technology.

How are WE all affected?

Throughout our entire history as human beings we have been dependent on one resource: water. In spite of all the efforts of municipalities and organizations responsible for water quality and safety including the EPA (Environmental Protection Agency www.epa.gov) which is the sole regulatory agency for municipal water safety in the USA, harmful chemicals and bacteria still occur in our municipal drinking water systems.

In July, 2010, the National Resources Defense Council (NRDC) released a report summarizing the presumed effects of global warming on water sustainability in the United States.


Why are WE all affected?

In order to neutralize bacteria in our drinking water, municipalities are required to conduct a chemical water disinfection which results in chemical bi-products within the drinking water consumed by people. Some of these dangerous chemicals, such as chloroform, do not even have a safety limit! This means that the presence of even the smallest dose of such chemicals in drinking water would substantially elevate the risk of cancer and other diseases for the people and animals that consume them in drinking water. In addition, some bacteria still manage to live in large networks of municipal drinking water supply pipes!

 In accordance with the annual reports of the Office of the Auditor General of Canada on safety of drinking water, municipalities produce drinking water which correspond with the legally enforceable drinking water standards in about 99.7% of cases. This means that during the year about 0.3% time (which is equivalent to 30 hours) our municipal drinking water can go to people inadequately purified. This does not include the chemical bi-products issue mentioned above!

When IS there going to be a solution?

A solution exists today! There is only one commercially available system on the market that is able to remove virtually 100 percent of bacteria contaminants and eliminate or substantially reduce harmful chemicals in drinking water such as chloroform as well as other chemicals bi-products (resulting from municipal water treatment) while retaining any desirable ingredients such as salts of calcium. That system is Pure Defense. While there are many residential water purification systems that claim to remove harmful chemicals and/or bacteria, they are usually only able to remove a small portion of them due to technological constraints and as a result would unfortunately still lead to consumers being affected by biological contamination or harmful chemicals and become subjected to potential diseases such as cancer that arise from them.

Where can OUR supporters contribute?

You can contribute by simply supporting our campaign! This can be in the form of donations and/or publicity. In order to further spread our message, we have even decided to match any donations made by you up to $50 USD towards purchasing our system. Our current product Pure Defense list price is $300 USD.

Who WE are?

Our achievements

Through our extraordinary efforts, we were able to develop the state of the art commercial water and beverages decontamination/purification technology which was awarded with three Gold Seal certificates by the most reputable international water association WQA (www.wqa.org) in all three categories: particles removal, chemical decontamination, and biological disinfection. Our commercial water purification systems are currently sold to bio-pharmaceutical customers and we would like to bring our technology to drinking water and beverages markets and finally address health issues discussed above. The residential water purification system in this campaign is our latest achievement. We were able to take the best technological solutions from our commercial/industrial system, place them inside a small-size housing unit and make it affordable to the vast majority of people.

Our dream

Through this campaign we believe that we have the ability to not only show people how better their lives would be without chemical preservatives but also, with the assistance of our supporters, we would like to provide them with a means of fundamentally improving the quality and safety of their water. In the future we would also like to provide people with the capabilities of removing undesirable chemical content from their favorite beverages, regardless of what they might be (beer, wine, juice etc.)

Testing our first completed system "Pure Defense"

Risks and challenges

Our biggest risk is that the supporter volume we would achieve from this campaign would not compensate for the costs we would need to reach our goals. 

Our technology is fully developed, and ready to go. Our product for residential customers (Pure Defense) is in its final stage of testing. Our current challenge remains to educate consumers around the world about the dangers of chemicals and bacteria contaminants in drinking water.

We would like to complement great efforts of municipal drinking water treatment facilities and finally make drinking water as safe and as good as it has to be in our modern society. Because of the uniqueness of our proven technology, our competitors are those companies who wishes to continue making money on selling people bottled municipal tap water  with a very fine print on bottle labels "water from public sources".

There is only one commercially available system on the market that is able to remove virtually 100 percent of bacteria contaminants and eliminate or substantially reduce harmful chemicals in drinking water such as chloroform as well as other chemicals bi-products (resulting from municipal water treatment) while retaining any desirable ingredients such as salts of calcium. That system is Pure Defense. While there are many residential water purification systems that claim to remove harmful chemicals and/or bacteria, they are usually only able to remove a small portion of them due to technological constraints and as a result would unfortunately still lead to consumers being affected by biological contamination or harmful chemicals and become subjected to potential diseases such as cancer that arise from them.Where can OUR supporters contribute?You can contribute by simply supporting our campaign! This can be in the form of donations and/or publicity. In order to further spread our message, we have even decided to match any donations made by you up to $50 USD towards purchasing our system. Our current product Pure Defense list price is $300 USD.Who WE are?Our achievementsThrough our extraordinary efforts, we were able to develop the state of the art commercial water and beverages decontamination/purification technology which was awarded with three Gold Seal certificates by the most reputable international water association WQA (www.wqa.org) in all three categories: particles removal, chemical decontamination, and biological disinfection. Our commercial water purification systems are currently sold to bio-pharmaceutical customers and we would like to bring our technology to drinking water and beverages markets and finally address health issues discussed above. The residential water purification system in this campaign is our latest achievement. We were able to take the best technological solutions from our commercial/industrial system, place them inside a small-size housing unit and make it affordable to the vast majority of people.Our dreamThrough this campaign we believe that we have the ability to not only show people how better their lives would be without chemical preservatives but also, with the assistance of our supporters, we would like to provide them with a means of fundamentally improving the quality and safety of their water. In the future we would also like to provide people with the capabilities of removing undesirable chemical content from their favorite beverages, regardless of what they might be (beer, wine, juice etc.)Testing our first completed system "Pure Defense"Risks and challengesOur biggest risk is that the supporter volume we would achieve from this campaign would not compensate for the costs we would need to reach our goals. Our technology is fully developed, and ready to go. Our product for residential customers (Pure Defense) is in its final stage of testing. Our current challenge remains to educate consumers around the world about the dangers of chemicals and bacteria contaminants in drinking water.We would like to complement great efforts of municipal drinking water treatment facilities and finally make drinking water as safe and as good as it has to be in our modern society. Because of the uniqueness of our proven technology, our competitors are those companies who wishes to continue making money on selling people bottled municipal tap water  with a very fine print on bottle labels "water from public sources".

story:
WHO ARE WE?

We are a team of scientists from the Department of Geography, Ecology and Natural Protection in the South West University "Neofit Rilski" Blagoevgrad, Bulgaria. We have been working on numerous Environmental projects in the field of Hydrology, Climatology, Geology,  Geomorphology and many others.



 

Help us to develop a web based Flood forecasting and warning system for small river basins!

 

 

 

What is this?


Traditional flood forecasting and warning systems are based on manual calculations made by hydrologists or through standalone computer programs. The main drawbacks of these methods are long forecasting times due to their time-consuming nature, reliance on individual knowledge, lack of communication, or in the absence of experts, etc. 

We propose:

A Web-based flood forecasting system (WFFS) for small river basins, that includes five main modules: 

real-time rainfall data conversion, model-driven rainfall-runoff forecasting, model calibration, precipitation forecasting, and flood analysis, 

as presented here in this project. 

The WFFS brings significant convenience to personnel engaged in flood
forecasting and control, allowing real-time contribution from a wide range of
experts who may be located elsewhere in times of emergency. The conceptual
framework and detailed components of the proposed WFFS, which employs a
multi-tiered architecture, are illustrated. Our multi-tiered architecture offers
great flexibility, portability, reusability and reliability. The prototype WFFS, will be developed in a suitable programming language and applied in the Blagoevgrad municipal region of Bulgaria for test and trial until a satisfactory result is achieved.

How does it work?

It is noted that floods account for 15 percent of all natural disaster related deaths. For example, between 1987 and 1997, 44 percent of all flood disasters affected Asia, claiming 228 000 lives (roughly 93 per cent of all flood-related deaths worldwide)! Economic losses for this region totaled 136 billion USD. 

Over the last two decades many deaths have been caused in countries of the European Union (EU) caused both by flash and pluvial floods, in addition to those resulting from the more usual fluvial or river floods. In all the
mountainous areas of Europe, populations are threatened by the risk of flash
floods. Floods can occur anywhere after heavy rain. All flood plains are vulnerable to heavy storms causing flash floods in any part of the world. Flash floods can also occur after a period of drought when heavy rain falls onto very dry, hard ground, through which the water cannot penetrate. 

Floods come in all sorts of forms, from small flash floods to sheets of water covering huge areas of land. They can be triggered by severe thunderstorms, tornadoes, tropical and extra tropical cyclones (many of which can be exacerbated by the El Niño phenomenon), monsoons, ice jams or melting snow. 

Flooding is a chronic natural hazard with potentially devastating
consequences, giving rise to a third of all losses due to natural events.
Extreme weather events over the last decade have fueled the perception that,
whether due to anthropogenic global warming or otherwise, flooding is becoming
more extreme, more widespread and more frequent. As the risks and the costs of
such natural disasters are likely to increase due to global social and environmental
changes, there is a widespread debate among stakeholders and activists “on issues
of responsibility and liability, as well as on the appropriate measures for
mitigating losses and providing relief to victims” (Linnerooth-Bayer and
Amendola, 2003). 

Such prospective developments have lead to an increased emphasis on the improvement of operational flood forecasting and to the enhancement and refinement of flood-risk management systems. 

During the past couple of years, a great number of flash flood events have been recorded in Bulgaria, claiming a great number of lives and costing a fiscal loss of almost  200 million Euros. These were mostly flash floods that occurred in small river basins. 

The purpose of a Web based flood forecasting and warning system then is to provide as much advance notice as possible of an impending flood to the authorities and the general public.  A crucial endeavor indeed!  

Over time, the demand for flood forecasting has evolved from requiring a general indication on the likelihood of flooding (for example on small rivers) to requiring a more definitive prediction on the magnitude and timing of floods at key locations. 

The main components of a Web based flood forecasting and warning system are the following:

(a) Collect real-time data for the prediction of flood severity, including the time of onset, extent, and magnitude of flooding;
(b) Prepare forecast information and warning messages, giving clear statements on what is happening, what may happen and its expected impact;
(c) Communicate and disseminate such messages, which also can include what actions should be taken;
(d) Interpret  the forecast and flood observations, in order to provide
situation updates and determine the possible impacts on communities and
infrastructure;
(e) Stimulate response to warnings issued by the agencies and communities involved;
(f) Review the warning system and make improvements to the system after flood events.

There is strong linkage between the above elements and the application of Geographical Information Systems (GIS).

Main Features

Forecasting and warning services are, in most cases, state services and their main goal is to deliver reliable and timely information to civil protection services as well as to the general public. This should be accomplished with enough lead time to allow people to take adequate measures to protect themselves from flooding or take appropriate action. Because of that, the presented Web based flood forecasting and warning system  will be developed as a private copyrighted project and will be sold to local authorities for a fixed sum, collecting a small annual fee that will cover the expenses aligned to conducting research on specific river basins.


In Bulgaria, there are 256 municipalities and almost all of them have on their territory more than one river with small drainage basins. That is why this particular type of research has so much potential for growth. 

 
To design a suitable flood forecasting service, it is necessary to understand:
(a) The hydromorphological characteristics of the basin, topography, geology and soils, and the degree of structural development;
(b) The main physical processes occurring during hydrometeorological events;
(c) The type of service that is required or can be achieved technically and
economically.

The WFFS created by this project is based on a rainfall-runoff model and is focused on forecasting flash flood events in two main types of catchment areas:

(a) Very small densely populated urban basins (a few square kilometers in area), having a high proportion of impermeable surfaces responding in the order of one or two hours overwhelming the capacity of the drainage network;
(b) Upper watersheds and small to medium catchments (between 10 and 500 square kilometers in area), which will respond in a few hours. Those catchments located in upland areas and with steep slopes react quickly;

In both of these basin types the time between actual rainfall and its discharge is very short, which is why this system emphasizes two main modules of forecasting.  The first is based on rain forecast and the expected discharge trough the river channel. The second relies on real-time information about the actual rainfall around the catchment area provided by an automatic weather station. In the first case, the warning time can be a couple of days and in the second within the range of one or two hours. The hydromorphological characteristics of the basin, topography, area, geology, and soils, and the degree of structural development are almost constant, while variables such as soil moisture and air temperatures are delivered by weather stations. The values of the constants and variables will predict the certain level of river basin discharge under defined conditions, which is the essentials of forecasting flash flood events .

Principal model of web
based flood forecasting and warning system

 


  Help to us to develop and together we can save lives!

Web Based Floods Forecasting and Warning System (WFFS) is a product made to provide advanced warning to the local authorities and emergency services for better and adequate reaction. The emphasis on forecasting mainly flash floods in small river basins is a distinct feature of this system. It has a rainfall-runoff
model and relies on real-time data gathered from automatic weather stations as
well as data provided from meteorological forecasts about expected rainfall. The
system analyzes the constant hydromorphological parameters of river basins such
as Geologic settings, soil, vegetation, terrain inclination and topography, and variables such as rainfall, air temperature, soil moisture and the stage of vegetation. Combining the constants and variables, the system can forecast the expected volume of discharge among given river basins. The results are moderated using GIS software and reliable, timely information is given to the civil protection services as well as to the general public based on a web application ensuring enough time for suitable response.

How the money will be spent


 THE CLIMATE IS CHANGING

It is all over the news now. There has not been a single day without hearing this mantra. We, as a team of scientists that have been working on this for many years, can help to understand the dynamics of this change, but we are short on funds. That is why we need you to please help us and raise the money that we need, and together we really can save human lives.

WHAT WE DO TODAY ECHOES IN ETERNITY.

WE THANK YOU FOR YOUR VALUABLE CONTRIBUTION.

story:
Introducing a Shock Free Training Solution

Admit it, you love your dog. Maybe you love your dog more than anything else in the world, we wouldn't be surprised. BUT! We also know that sometimes there's scenarios that can make your dog-loving heart angry when you see your brand new couch torn to pieces. Or your garbage can open with trash all over the floor. Or your bed full of fur (or worse things). These are all scenarios that every dog owner faces at some point or another, and we want to help prevent these situations from happening by introducing the Spot Collar to the world. 

The Spot Collar is an e-collar that we're introducing here on Indiegogo that gives off a light vibration and beep when your dog goes near places that you choose. You protect those areas by placing Spotters, sending off a signal (either 30-50 cm or 70-100 cm, you choose). When the Spot Collar gets within range of the Spotter, the Spot Collar is activated and the dog knows where it's not allowed. 


Want to protect your couch? Place a Spotter there.

Garbage can?

 The toilet?

 You get the idea. 

There's tons of training methods out there that are costly and sometimes even ineffective, but not the Spot Collar. We want to bring the Spot Collar to the world allowing dog owners an affordable and easy to use device, simplifying dog care as we know it. In the future, we're going to make sure to make the next version of the Spot Collar an even better training solution for dog owners by keeping our ears open to feedback. 

Why We've Come to Indiegogo & Why We Need Your Help

We have sold more than 10,000 units in China. In order to produce the international version, we need at least 10,000 USD to invest in the packaging, instructions, inventory, logistics and marketing. We figured the best place to go would be to approach the lovely people of Indiegogo for their help. We've spent countless hours consulting with various distributors and it would mean the world to us if you showed any bit of support, no matter the size (Chihuahua small to Tibetan Mastiff big, we'll love you all the same ♥ ).

Spot Collar Technical Specs

Radius levels: 30-50cm and 70-100cm
Suitable dog’s neck perimeter : 20-36 cm
Spot Collar dimension: 58*34*16mm
Spotter dimension: 27.5*56.5*9mm
Collar material:  TPSIV
Spot Collar and Spotter material: ABS
Water resistance level: IP63
Spot Collar battery life: 20 days with lithium-ion reachable battery
Charging cable: micro USB
Spotter battery life: 5 months with CR2302 button battery
Spotter transmission frequency: 315mhz

FAQ:
What size dog does the Spot Collar work best on?
The Spot Collar works best on small to medium sized dogs, due to the current collar size.
How long will the shipping take?
If we get funded, the Spot Collar will be delivered within 3 weeks.
Will you be able to fulfill on your campaign?
Absolutely! We have fulfilled over 10,000 units in China.

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't pledge? That's fine, there's other ways that you can show your support. You can tell your friends, share our campaign on Facebook, or even just write us a poem about how you love us. Anything helps!

story:
About this Campaign

Koh Seh is a remote island, renowned for its richness of marine resources. Sadly, it has been facing years of illegal fishing activities that have slowly deteriorated the marine ecosystem there. There is a need to protect Koh Seh's marine ecosystem now, or we may risk losing its pristine environment forever.

As it is the first marine project that ever started by Cambodian students, we believe that this project will give a big help to the life underneath the sea, especially for Cambodian ocean and make a potential chance for the next generation to learn more about marine life. 

 

About Us

(From left) Mengleang, Gnen, Rachana and Vida. We are Final Year Students majoring Environmental Science at Pannasastra University of Cambodia. We created the “Artificial Reef Team” for our final year project. It is our first foray into the marine field. We work together and get support on technical training from Marine Conservation Cambodia (MCC).

 

Our Goal

We are constructing an artificial reef at Koh Seh Island, in Kep, Cambodia. Our goal is to install the artificial reef to create an enhanced fish habitat and to investigate on fish population.

 

We strongly believe that our project will provide a great habitat for fishes and other marine organisms, enabling greater biodiversity and thereby sustaining a habitat of diverse marine organisms. Moreover, we hope that the fish population will increase, which would ensure long-term sustainability of local fisherman’s livelihoods in the future.

 

How You Can Help

Your support will help promote the project, make Cambodian people aware of what is artificial reef and know how important it is to the marine ecosystem.

 

Your help can be a part of providing path and encourages us to keep moving forward to achieve our goal, especially, gives a light to the next generation to do more research.

 

In the other way beside money, you can be a part of the helper just by sharing this campaign to your peers, colleagues and anyone who possibly be interested and want to contribute. Please contribute and together, we can protect and restore Cambodian ocean for future generation.

 

You may find a more detailed budget breakdown in the graphic below

 

 

Our Project Schedule

During the course of our crowdfunding project, we will be working very hard in the field and constructing an artificial reef in Koh Seh Island, Cambodia.

Stay tuned to our campaign page updates and like us on Facebook to get more photos and videos of our activities on the island.

Thank you for helping us.

story:
Introducing the µPower Cookstove

We are a small team of engineers from Trinity College Dublin who, over the past 5 years, have developed and field tested a technology that can produce electricity from a low cost and locally made efficient biomass cookstove. The stove is much more efficient than the traditional 3-stone open fires currently used in many developing countries and thus slows down deforestation and CO2 production and dramatically improves people's health and safety. The electrical generator is simple, robust and locally made and can charge mobile phones, LED lanterns and radios...all this while simply preparing the daily meals.



Collaborating with the Irish Department of Foreign Affairs (Irish Aid) as well as the NGO Concern Universal, we have been developing the technology in Malawi, Africa. We have done this by learning from the Malawian people who have used trial versions of the stove generator and then adapting the design so it is suited for the people who want and need them. In a way, the technology is being designed by the Malawian people themselves.

Our dream is a clean hybrid heat and electricity generating technology that reduces deforestation, improves health & safety while saving and possibly earning  precious income. It will be locally manufactured and sold making it low cost and maintainable while creating jobs and income: it will be truly sustainable.

We believe that the  µPower Cookstove can provide the Power to Change Lives.

Note: This is an OPEN SOURCE PROJECT. All data, technical specifications, designs, hardware and software and any other relevant information is free and accessible to anyone!

What We Have





We have been developing this technology since 2011, spending many months every year in Malawi performing field trials and adapting the design to its current embodiment.

The µPower Cookstove works and there is a huge demand for them already. Word has spread throughout Malawi and even other parts of Africa. 

We have the technology, we have the demand and now we need the supply.

What We Need


“It has to be something people can make and sell in Malawi and that others will want to buy.”  Professor Anthony Robinson, as quoted in a recent article in the Irish Times.

What we need now is the spark that will ignite a wildfire roll out of µPower Cookstoves across all of Malawi; who knows where it may go from there? With numbers potentially in the millions in Malawi alone, this requires infrastructure:

● $160,000 will finance the people, material and equipment needed to build close-to-consumer assembly plants, train local women's groups in the assembly, maintenance and repair of the stoves and micro-finance small entrepreneurial businesses for sales and distribution.

● $70,000 will provide the funding for the first 1000 µPower Cookstoves which will be targeted at the most vulnerable families in the remote regions of the Thyolo district of Malawi. This is also where the current ceramic production facility for the µPower Cookstove is located (see picture below).


Albeit a moderate initial volume of 1000 units, the important thing is that the campaign will have established the infrastructure needed to produce and sell the next 1000, then 10,000 then 100,000. Help us make it to a million homes where having electricity  is not even a dream.

Every cent raised above our target will allow us to expand infrastructure to other regions in Malawi and hugely accelerate deployment to all those in need.

Here is a short video telling the whole story, enjoy!


What You Get

Our perks include a mixture of personal messages, real Malawian recipes from the remote villages, audio and video files and thermoelectric generator do-it-yourself manuals and kits. For larger donations, come to Malawi and take part in the project for a few days; see the assembly plants and enjoy a meal with a family using the µPower Cookstove...maybe charge your phone while you are there! See the real impact of your contribution while enjoying the hospitality of these generous people in the beautiful country of Malawi.



The Impact


"90% of people in Malawi have no access to electricity" BBC correspondent Roger Harrabin reports on BBC World Service about the energy and environmental crisis in Malawi during the recent United Nations COP21 climate conference in Paris.

In fact, only about 1% of the rural poor of Malawi have access to grid electricity. Almost every family cooks over a 3-stone open fire. This means,

  • Malawi is almost completely deforested and still losing over 2000 square kilometres every year.
  • Smoke and toxic gas from indoor cooking ranks ahead of unsafe water as a cause of death in developing countries. It is the world's #1 killer of children under 5 years old.
  • Poorest quality light or complete darkness which translates into lost income and studying opportunities.
  • Time and lost income opportunities scavenging and transporting firewood and walking for hours to phone charging stations...several times every week!
  • Precious income spent on phone charging; could be a month's income or more every year!
Efficient cooking on a simple stove together with a robust and sustainable thermoelectric generator system SAVES TIME, SAVES MONEY, SAVES LIVES.



In The News
See the BBC World Service Facebook video post that went viral...OVER 19 MILLION VIEWS!!



The Open source Model of Technology Development


This is an OPEN SOURCE project: there are no patents, trade secrets or any other type of intellectual property protection. 

We strongly believe that the free and open communication of ideas, knowledge and experience is the only way that a technology like this can evolve into something viable and impactful. Below are some examples of how our open source model has been carried out so far;

  • We publish all of the technical information of the design and performance in the top academic Energy journals e.g. Applied Energy, Energy for Sustainable Development.
  • The Burn Design Lab wanted to test a thermoelectric generator system for their "plancha" style stove. They reached out to us and we designed, constructed and shipped a system to them that was then trialled in Guatemala.
  • We have had many voice and video calls with groups from around the world; ranging from NGOs to high school students, including a team from the East Salem High School in Oregon who were recently awarded a 2015-16 Lemelson-MIT InvenTeam grant to generate electricity from cooking in the developing world.
  • We have assembled and shipped various hardware components to groups trying to design their own electricity-producing cookstoves.
  • We have commissioned small video documentaries about the project in order to reach out through social media. Check out this documentary of our very first field trial in the Balaka District of Malawi in 2011.

Below shows examples of how knowledge is dissemination in peer reviewed academic journals...notice how far reaching knowledge can be!


Risks & Challenges

This is an ambitious project and with that there are real risks and significant challenges. Some of these we already understand and anticipate from our years of experience, whereas others are yet to reveal themselves, and be assured, they will. These may be technical, behavioural or even societal. However,  we do not see risks and challenges as barriers, we see them as opportunities to learn and discover. This is precisely why we are where we are today.

We are a team of engineers and development professionals that have worked together for many years on this project. Through thick and thin we have brought the technology to the point where it is now at the stage where we believe it is ready for mass deployment. Despite the challenges that lay ahead, we are ready and prepared to take them on because the people we are serving deserve it.

Other Ways You Can Help

Awareness and education is so important. Even as seasoned world travellers, our preconceived notions about  Malawi and the Malawian people  were so wildly off the mark that it goes to show that only education and experience can truly open your eyes and heart to the beauty and bounty of the earth and its people. The Malawian people are some of the kindest, most generous, hard working family and community orientated people we have ever had the pleasure of knowing.



If you cannot help by making a donation we urge you to use our Twitter and/or Facebook platforms to ask us questions, make comments, raise issues, start a conversation with the world community. This will;

  • Raise awareness of energy poverty in general
  • Inform and possibly dispel false facts and incorrect information
  • Bring an international perspective to an international problem
  • Provide a platform for the seeds of new ideas to be planted
  • Spread the word about our campaign to those who may have the means to donate

Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!
story_txt:
Introducing the µPower Cookstove
We are a small team of engineers from Trinity College Dublin who, over the past 5 years, have developed and field tested a technology that can produce electricity from a low cost and locally made efficient biomass cookstove. The stove is much more efficient than the traditional 3-stone open fires currently used in many developing countries and thus slows down deforestation and CO2 production and dramatically improves people's health and safety. The electrical generator is simple, robust and locally made and can charge mobile phones, LED lanterns and radios...all this while simply preparing the daily meals.







Collaborating with the Irish Department of Foreign Affairs (Irish Aid) as well as the NGO Concern Universal, we have been developing the technology in Malawi, Africa. We have done this by learning from the Malawian people who have used trial versions of the stove generator and then adapting the design so it is suited for the people who want and need them. In a way, the technology is being designed by the Malawian people themselves.



Our dream is a clean hybrid heat and electricity generating technology that reduces deforestation, improves health & safety while saving and possibly earning  precious income. It will be locally manufactured and sold making it low cost and maintainable while creating jobs and income: it will be truly sustainable.

We believe that the  µPower Cookstove can provide the Power to Change Lives.

story:
Why is this an SOS call

I have been passionate about demonstrating how nature has a solution for most of our problems for a few years now. Embedding myself deeper each day has brought me to many products that have change my life drastically in a positive way.

When hurricane Harvey went through our lovely Houston, it devastated 100s of 1000s of people. As most of you know, one of our HUGE problem right now is mold. We have companies coming in from all over the country "taking" care of the problem. What the desperate homeowner is not realizing in their moment of need, is that the chemicals these companies are using to combat the quick growing mold situation is only creating a bigger problem that will now affect EVERYONE, not just the flood victims. In a couple of years when this has been mostly contained (yes, it will take that long), we are going to be left with so many toxic chemicals in our soil and water that now we are going to be seeing bigger issues. 

When I saw The Human Experiment documentary (http://thehumanexperimentmovie.com/) not only did I cry, (I was not able to get pregnant) but I thought THAT is what I am trying to say! it has to be related to the use of all these synthetic products in EVERYTHING we touch!... This was before hurricane Harvey... Now I am presented with this opportunity to do something about it, WE have it in our hands to start the change.

I need your help to do it. With your support I will be able to start with one fully equipped unit to offer a 100% plant based, biodegradable, proven mold solution. NO deconstruction necessary keeping a lot of unnecessary debris and contamination from our landfills, unless the structure is damage by termites or has been under water too long and is crumbling, our product will WORK to rid any dueling of mold and its spores without having to tear walls down. This is guaranteed, if we have to come back and retreat it is PLANT BASED BIODEGRADABLE, it will not harm anything or anybody EVER. This is not the case with ANY of the chemical companies.

 

​Chemicals in the everyday environment

The risks to humans and the environment (Published by Kemi Swedish Chemical Company)
https://www.kemi.se/en/guidance-for/consumers/c...

Some chemical substances do not degrade but accumulate in the bodies of human beings and animals. Some chemical substances are harmful in that they give rise to problems such as allergies. Researchers have found over 300 substances in human blood samples and breast milk, some of which can interfere with the hormone system or nervous system.

Children and young people are more sensitive to chemicals than are adults. This is partly because their bodies, including the brain, hormone system and immune system, are not fully developed. This may mean life-long consequences if damage occurs during childhood.

Chemical products can be acutely toxic, which means they may cause damage such as corrosive injuries straight away. They may also harm the environment. A chemical substance contained in an article can be absorbed by human skin, accumulate in the dust we inhale, or end up in the natural environment. A large amount of articles also results in a large amount of waste materials, which can in turn leach hazardous substances. We can be indirectly affected by substances which leach into the natural environment, spread further into the soil and water and then into vegetables and fish, and end up on our dinner table.

Did you know that in the US there’s been no new regulation governing the use of chemicals for personal care since 1938! While the FDA has only banned 11 ingredients since then, the more cautious European Union has banned over 1,300! These are only products banned for personal care, so that means that we probably have 10 times more being used in our house hold items and in our agriculture that are toxic and detremental to us and the environmet.

 

But there’s hope! With recent advances in ‘green chemistry’, today it’s possible to formulate all-natural products that perform as well as - or even better than - conventional products.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We will need $55,000 for equipment such as air scrubbers, dehumidifiers, air movers, water extraction vacuums and foggers and a 6 month lease on a commercial vehicle, the time estimated to start being profitable and self sustaining with enough capital to launch a second unit.

With that money I will also launch a campaign demonstrating how our product works and why it is imperative we start using it. 

Another business that is incorporated in this is one of natural products. You can help us launch by pre-ordering some of our small consumer products. Did you know that one of the main ingredients in our mold mitigating product is Thyme? You do now :) 

For the perks and keeping with the holistic approach to life, I am offering the very popular aromatherapy oils, diffusers, necklaces and one of my favorite sayings in a cup, "I've Got an OIL for that!", aromatherapy and natural ingredients will change your life. I do SO much with essential oils that I have eliminated about 70% of harmful products from my house and have replaced them with plant based easy blends that I make at home or buy form the health store. I am doing my part with the environment and at the same time living a cleaner life.

 

The Impact

It is time to start doing more, to "Be the change you want to see in the world." ~Gandhi
Whenever we have a chance to make a positive change we have to take it! This is my chance to make a difference and I am asking for your help to get there faster, this is very time sensitive.
Not only will we spearhead this movement here in Texas where it is desperately needed, but anywhere were chemicals are still being used to treat mold like in the Midwest, this problem affects our whole country, this problem affects our whole planet, but as you can see WE here in the United States of America have our work cutout for us... enough is enough.

 

Risks & Challenges

We have a full business plan ready to launch this venture. We have a full budget ready for all the equipment needed to launch. We just need the initial funding to get this going. We will keep everyone updated on the progress and roll out the rewards ASAP.

Thank you for your support!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please help us by getting the word out! Make some noise about this cause, it will help ALL of us in the long run :) There is a SHARE button on this campaign, by SHARING you will be helping us tremendously and we will greatly appreciated. I know this is a small beginning for a BIG change.

I appreciate you being here! :)

story:
Connecting our woodlands together

Over time many of our Essex woodlands have become fragmented islands, isolated and disconnected and no longer able to speak to each other - in an ecological sense.

The aim of the Big Green Internet project is to work with land owners and farmers to plant wildlife corridors and hedgerows to connect our woodlands together to create one 'big green internet' of trees.

We will also plant heritage varieties of Essex apples and pears.  Some varieties are almost 100 years old !!

The project's focus is south Essex, creating a connected network of woodlands from Epping Forest in the west to the North Sea in the East.

The target is to plant 100 miles of corridor over the next ten years.

The first project for this winter is to plant 30,000 hedgerow trees in the Tendring district of Essex and create six km of new hedgerows.  This will take place this coming winter (20/21).  At the same time we will be celebrating the Tree Council's tree wardening programme which has been running for 30 years.

This first project will cost in the region of £30,000, most, but not all, will come from grants.  We are looking therefore to raise an initial  £10,000 to cover the balance.

story:
This is the village with our farm outlined in blue. It is 11 acres in total.

14°30'44.78" N 104°03'02.19" E Google Maps

Tab Tim or Red Tilapia

A simplified version of what we will build




Short Summary

I and my Thai wife live in the UK. She owns a farm in a small village in Eastern Thailand near to the Cambodian border. Most young people have to leave the village to work.We want to start a co-operative with the intention of growing fish and vegetables using a recirculating Aquaponics system. We would like to provide employment and a cheap source of fresh produce for the local villages. We would initially produce 2000 kilos of red Tilapia per month and 1000 kilos of Tomatoes, salad crops and herbs. All surpluses will be sold on the many local markets. We intend to relocate to our bungalow on the farm, to oversee the project. 

What We Need & What You Get

I have estimated that £20000 will be needed to achieve the goals set out above.

The money will be spent on the following:-

40m x 40m concrete base

4 x 4m fish tanks

8 x 15m x 2m bio-filter growbeds

Pumps & pipework

Backup generator system 

If we raise extra funding we will increase the capacity as soon as we have perfected the first phase. We have enough land available to create production in excess of 10 tons per month of fish plus vegetables.



The Impact

If we can start this exciting project it will have a profound impact on our small village. Jobs will be created not only in the production and sales of the produce, but also in the construction and maintenance of the site. The ultimate goal is to expand production and have an onsite processing/packing plant for export sales.

Risks & Challenges

The main risk lies in the maintenance of the correct water quality. This is achieved by testing the water twice daily and making any necessary adjustments to the water flow through the filters. The main challenge will be training the staff to understand the importance of this. Due to the inconsistency of the local electricity supply, our own generator will provide an automatic back-up supply in the event of power cuts 24/7

I have been researching the Aquaponic production methods for over four years and believe that I have the knowledge to overcome any pitfalls that may arise.

This is the leveled site ready to start phase one of our project

    The Impact If we can start this exciting project it will have a profound impact on our small village. Jobs will be created not only in the production and sales of the produce, but also in the construction and maintenance of the site. The ultimate goal is to expand production and have an onsite processing/packing plant for export sales.
    Risks & Challenges The main risk lies in the maintenance of the correct water quality. This is achieved by testing the water twice daily and making any necessary adjustments to the water flow through the filters. The main challenge will be training the staff to understand the importance of this. Due to the inconsistency of the local electricity supply, our own generator will provide an automatic back-up supply in the event of power cuts 24/7
I have been researching the Aquaponic production methods for over four years and believe that I have the knowledge to overcome any pitfalls that may arise.
    
This is the leveled site ready to start phase one of our project

story:
Earthquakes, tsunamis, heatwaves, snowstorms. There is no denying that the earth is changing and global warming is the cause. We might not be able to stop factories from polluting or cars from burning fuel, but a simple thing we all can do is plant more trees. Help me get land and plant a forest and, in the end, the world will be a better place. After all, the amount of oxygen produced by a mature leafy tree, is the same amount that ten people inhale in a year, so every tree counts.


I have been involved in ECO organizations and I have participated in many forestations. The process is easy and everyone is always eager to help. If this campaign is successful I will buy 10 acres (4 hectares) of land and plant trees on it. If you want, you can have a small sign with your name next to a tree. When you come into the forest, you can make it a challenge to find the tree with your name and sit at its shade, or up on its branches. After all, it has your name on it. 

The planting campaign will be done in autumn and in spring. This autumn I will plant 20000 shrubs. It is highly possible that not all the shrubs will catch, so I will have another planting session next spring. After the forest is complete, it will consume 420 metric tones of CO2 per year. That is approximately as much as 70 cars produce in the same amount of time. It is not much, but it is a beginning.


But most importantly, I would like to create a trend. It would benefit us all if more people would just plant as much trees as they can. If you support this campaign or even if you do not, please raise awareness that this is a simple solution for making the world a little bit better. For the love of trees :)


“The true meaning of life is to plant a tree under whose shade you do not expect to sit.” - Norm Henderson

story:
Well known X4 Pro can be yours, special offer. You can get your dream 2 times cheaper than it was before. Simple steps: Contribute for your own X4 Pro and get it two times cheaper with more powered battery which allows you to be in the sky almost for two times more.

And Watch our special Perks, practically everyone will get a present from us it can be discount or batteries for free. Take your chance to grab it today.

And only now, Special offer want to design your X4 Pro, give us to know: What colors you want and logos, we will do it with a big pleasure. You will be the owner of a unique X4 Pro. 

The H109S X4 Pro is Hobbico's best platform for aerial photography and videography. Assembled, complete and ready to fly, it includes a 1080p HD camera ideal for virtually any application and flight times that run as high as 60 minutes, depending on payload.

The Deluxe X4 Pro comes with a 2.4/5.8GHz transceiver that offers precision control of images and flight with the ease of a 7" touch screen and Android™ operating system. Actual Direction Control, Return to Home and a programmable Waypoints system provide pilots with tools that allow you to focus on creative vision rather than flight control.

Specifications
Diagonal: 370 mm
Weight: 1.06 kg (2.3 lb) RTF, without accessories. 
Max. Takeoff Weight: 1.42 kg (3.1 lb)
Flight Time: 42 minutes with accessories, 60 minutes without
Flight Battery: 3S, 11.1V 7000mAh HD LiPo Battery
Transceiver Battery: 2S, 7.4V 5400mAh LiPo Battery
Camera Battery: Battery: 1S, 650mAh LiPo Battery
Power System: brushless motor & ESC
Onboard Nav Systems: GPS, Barometer & Compass
Flight Modes: Normal & ADC (Actual Directional Control)

As with other multi-rotor systems, it features a GPS based flight control system. The enables very precise positioning, which is especially important when recording video, and provides enhanced flight stability compared to relying on gyro/IMU data alone. Thanks to the ground station system integrated into the transmitter, waypoint navigation is also possible. With this technology, you simply plot a point-to-point rout over a map using the device's touchscreen. If you change your mind, the waypoint course can be updated in-flight.

Along with the quadcopter, transmitter, gimbal system, and camera, this bundle includes a 7000mAh 3S LiPo flight battery, a 5000mAh LiPo transmitter battery, battery chargers for the flight battery and transmitter battery, a sun shade for the FPV screen, a strap for the transmitter, a prop wrench, a set of prop guards, and antennas for the transmitter and video receiver.

Air System Design

Removable Props Guards

The guards help protect the propellers from collisions as well as add an additional element of safety

H7000 Transmitter And Ground Station

2.4 GHz Radio System

The control signal from the transmitter to the aircraft is sent over a 2.4 GHz frequency, avoiding interference from/with the 5.8 GHz video signal. The transmitter boasts a range of up to 3280.8'

Auto Fixed Hover

When released, the throttle sticks automatically return to the middle. At this point, the X4 Pro will stand in a fixed hover until the pilot takes control again

Built-In 7" Android Mobile Device for Ground Station

Not merely a handheld controller, the included smart transmitter features a built-in 7", 1280 x 720 resolution IPS touchscreen plus a 1 GHz dual-core CPU running the Android OS. This allows you to view a live feed from the camera plus OSD overlay data. Additionally, you can access to ground station software to plot or update waypoint-base autopilot courses. A dedicated 5.8 GHz receiver with cloverleaf antenna picks up the video signal, supporting a range of up to 3280.8'

Gimbal Control Dial

A rotary dial on the right side of the transmitter allows you to adjust the camera angle during the flight

Plot Waypoint Based Autopilot Courses

Use the ground station app's touch screen interactivity to place waypoints (makers) over a 3D map. This allows you to define an autopilot course that passes through a pre-defined set of locations. Additional parameters - like speed and altitude - can also be set

OLED Screen

In addition to the 7" display for FPV and the ground station, there is a separate OLED status display to keep the pilot apprised of important vitals - even when the main display is switched off

Dedicated Switches

Switch S1: Enable/disable Headless Mode for intuitive orientation of aircraft
Switch S2: Altitude Mode and Position Mode selection
Switch S3: Engage/disengage Return-to-Home (RTH) function
Switch S4: Enable/disable Flight Course Mode

Rechargeable LiPo Battery

A 7.4V 5400mAh LiPo battery powers the transmitter - providing the juice it and the 7" ground station screen require

Camera and 3-Axis Gimbal System

Hubsan HBS1080P 1080p Action Camera

For recording Full HD footage from that air the HBS1080P action camera is included. In addition to 1080p video at 30 fps it can take JPEG still as up to 4032 x 3024 resolution. It features an ultra-wide angle lens providing an FOV of up to 170°

3-Axis Gimbal

To keep the camera stabilized and the horizon level, a 3-axis gimbal is included. It features a control angle accuracy of 0.01°. Additionally it provides the following range of motion:

Tilting: -160° to 160°
Rolling: -50° to 50° 
Panning: -160° to 160°

Besides the included HBS1080P, the gimbal also works with the GoPro HERO3, HERO3, and HERO4

Flight Control System Functions

Return-to-Home (RTH)

Automatically bring the quadcopter back to a pre-defined "home point" with the flip of switch. The aircraft will also return home automatically if contact with the transmitter is ever lost

Headless Mode - Intuitive Orientation

In this mode there is no longer a defined "noise" and "tail". Instead the aircraft always moves relative to the pilot - forward pressing forward, left pressing left, and so on. This keeps flying more intuitive, especially for beginner pilots

Altitude Mode

In this mode the quadcopter will maintain a fixed elevation. Right/left, back/front movement is still possible, however

Position Mode

This mode uses GPS to maintain a fixed position when the pilot releases the controls

story:
Welcome!

Gentle Hive Bee Foundation became an official 501c3 in 2014. 

Gentle Hive Bee Foundation has found alternatives to these treatments. Regular frame rotation, structured water, korean natural farming solutions, common fiber shop towels, and powdered sugar can be utilized to keep hives healthy and strong. The main solution is in the natural queen breeding. When she mates naturally she can mate with all available genetics. When she's artificially inseminated, she is limited to only those traits selected by man.

Prior to seeing the results of natural queen breeding, direct alternatives to the chemicals have been successfully used by Gentle Hive. By regularly inspecting and rotating specific frames in the hive, the queen constantly has clean places to lay her eggs. To encourage the bees to eradicate beetles, a fiber shop towel is put in the hive and the bees wrap the beetles up in the fibers. The commercial remedy for beetles is roach poison. Powdered sugar, sprinkled on the bees, encourages them to clean each other for mites. The commercial remedies for mites are Amitraz and formic acid. These have been found to leave harmful residues in the honey. The availability of structured water and mushrooms is a cure-all for hive health. Based on the direct results of completed gentle hive studies (on a small scale of 1 to 12 hives), our natural approach to hive health is also more affordable than the commercial expenses which include cost of chemicals and labor of application. Our hives also produce significantly more honey. The average hive in Hawaii produces 131 lbs per year. Our production ranges from 30 to 50 lbs per hive each month.

Gentle Hive Bee Foundation has already completed studies where we've taken bees off of chemicals, where we raise queens naturally, where we've allowed queens to breed naturally and we are not experiencing any colony collapse. When you contribute to this study you will be helping us to do this on a large scale that will be comparable to the size of a commercial apiary. Thank you for helping out.

I look forward to bringing you the positive results.

-Shane

What We Need

Funds raised will go towards:

  • Flat-Bed Truck ($20,000)
  • Lab Data ($12,000-$15,000)
  • Hive Cameras ($1,200)
  • Industrial Scale ($800)
  • Paid Employee ($150/day)
  • Transportation expenses 
  • Bees & Equipment ($12,500)
  • Preparation & Application of KNF soloutions ($500)
    • Boxes, frames, bottoms, tops
    • foundation
    • honey extractor
    • packaging/shipping of honey
    • bee feeders

What You Get

  • $5000 - Crystal Blue water structuring unit + Honey From "Your Own" Hive
  • $1000 - Honey From Your Sponsored Hive
    • We will be working with 40-100 hives during our study. Each of them will have a name! The name of your choice on your sponsored hive and we will send you half the honey that it produces for a year!
  • $500 - Be a guest on our podcast and/or choose the topic for the episode
  • $200 - Sponsor a Hive
    • Each of the 40-100 hives in our study will have a name!
    • The name of your choice on a hive
  • $100 - 1 pint of raw Hawai'ian Honey & and a Hunk of Honeycomb
  • $25 - You will be mentioned in a special segment of our podcast
  • $1 - A personalized "Thank You" from the Shane "The Bee Charmer" & his team
  • All donations over $75 receive a receipt to apply towards tax deduction 

The Impact

  • Bees are responsible for one of every three bites of food that you eat. Ensuring that bees thrive for future generations is of utmost urgency. Commercial bee companies are experiencing more than 50% annual hive loss. Gentle Hive has successfully rehabilitated chemical dependent hives on a small scale and experienced no colony collapse. Funds from this campaign go directly toward expanding those studies to a scale that is comparable to a commercial honey company (40-100 hives). Here's your chance to help us improve the health of the world's honey bees.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please get the word out and make some noise about our campaign!
  • Share our campaign video on your social media
  • Use the IndieGoGo share tools!
  • Talk about the importance of bees with your family and community
  • Listen to The Bee Programming Podcast 
  • Get involved with a local bee keeper and help support them
  • plant flowers
  • support raw, organic honey products

Thank you for supporting the bees!
